title: Refik Anadol Studio, Parag K. Mital, and LA Philharmonic
description: A PCGAN trained from the orchestra’s digital archives at the Walt Disney Concert Hall, the GAN-generated images are then animated with Houdini and projected on the walls of the concert hall
description_lemmatized: pcgan trained orchestra digital archive walt disney concert hall gangenerated image animated houdini projected wall concert hall
